title: @Riot Regarding project ashe, I love it a lot.
body: But can you make it so she doesnt talk every 3 seconds. Its getting really irritating and its only been one game with her.

replies.body: if you think Ashe talks a lot, try playing Taliyah! :^)
Holy shit she's fucking Annoying. Fun playstyle bad personality / VO. The exCt opposite of Sol

Hey Chrio,

I agree, been trying to balance her voice trigger % for a while now. Actually she is a lower % as far as how often she is suppose to talk compared to base Ashe, but what I think is happening is I added more hooks for more VO to trigger to spells and other things...this is now feeling way too chatty. Revisiting her VO trigger % should help with that amount of VO that is kicking off!

Thanks again for bringing this up, this helps a ton!

Hey sound bear, random question but its bothered me so for long. Why does project fiora randomly have 1 line in her vo that all her other skins dont? "Let them eat swords!". Ive found this very weird since release and i see no explanation why her and leona have some extra vo other skins dont :(. One last thing, thoughts on maybe making older champions not repeat their lines 3 times in a row? ive been playing nunu recently and i think his voice is really cute but hearing "lets make tracks!" twice-times in a row is not good :(

T.T but I enjoy chatty champions, hence my love for the Sol {{champion:136}} 

Also I thought Procject Ashe VO wasn't too chatty
Thanks for sharing that's interesting I didn't know that's how VOs were called , based on a percentage chance
